title: Concerning speed in a taxi
context: Tell the cab driver to slow down or speed up because you are late.

content.bestLine: Could you please speed up, I'm running late?

neutral.text: Can you speed up a bit?
I'm in a hurry, can you go faster?
Could you please drive more slowly?
Can we make it go a bit faster?

informal.text: Can you take the fast route?
I'm running super late, can you speed up?
Take it easy, but not too easy
Let's get moving, I've got a deadline

formal.text: I would appreciate it if you could drive more quickly
Could you please increase your speed?
I am running behind schedule, could you hurry?
Please drive at a safe but expedited pace
I would like to arrive as soon as possible, thank you
Could you take the most efficient route?

patterns.meaning: Requesting the driver to adjust speed
Asking the driver to hurry due to time constraints

dialogs.description: Asking the driver to speed up due to being late

lines.speaker: Passenger
lines.text: Excuse me, could you please speed up? I'm running late

lines.speaker: Driver
lines.text: Of course, I'll try to get you there as quickly as possible

dialogs.description: Requesting the driver to slow down

lines.speaker: Passenger
lines.text: Could you please slow down? I'm getting a bit anxious

lines.speaker: Driver
lines.text: Okay, I'll reduce my speed. Is this better?
